{"id":308886162,"lang":"python3","time":"1 year, 5 months","timestamp":1583217982,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"60 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/308886162/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"13.4 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def trap(self, height):\n        n = len(height)\n        if n <= 1 : \n            return 0 \n        buffer = [-1 for i in range(n)]\n        maxi = -1\n\n        for i in range(n):\n            cur = height[i]\n            buffer[i] = maxi\n            if cur > 0 and cur > maxi : \n                maxi = cur\n        maxi = -1\n                \n        for i in range(n-1,0,-1):\n            cur = height[i]\n            buffer[i] = min(maxi,buffer[i])\n            if cur > 0 and cur > maxi : \n                maxi = cur\n        reserve = 0 \n        for i in range(n):\n            buf_cur = buffer[i]\n            cur = height[i]\n            \n            if buf_cur == -1 : \n                continue\n            else : \n                reserve += max(0,buf_cur-cur)\n\n        return reserve\n\n                ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
